description: Sin descripción

name: S.N.I.P.E.R: Hunter Scope - Tactical Arsenal
description: Sin descripción

name: Rô + Fire Race + Scrap Bolts + Milk Seller + Home Sweet Home + Rafa's World
description: Sin descripción

name: Over Horizon X Steel Empire
description: Nostalgic thrills await in this trio of shoot ’em-up masterpieces!

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance - Safety Difficulty
description: Adds the "Safety" difficulty option, suggested for beginners or those who want to enjoy the story. This difficulty is recommended for those who have little experience with RPGs.

name: Moonstone Island: Cozy Comforts DLC Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Moonstone Island: Decor Galor DLC Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Moonstone Island: Decorator's Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: A Frog's Job: Level Pack 1
description: Sin descripción

name: A Frog's Job: Level Pack 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night - Classic II: Dominique's Curse
description: Classic II: Dominique's Curse brings retro-gameplay action to Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night! Featuring a larger map, canon Bloodstained storyline and brand-new gameplay, it's a brand new, old-school adventure. Which ending will you get?

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance - DLC All-in-One
description:
The DLC All-in-One bundle set includes the following:
• DLC Content - Mitama Dance of Wealth
• DLC Content - Mitama Dance of EXP
• DLC Content - Mitama Dance of Miracles
• Demon Subquest - Sakura Cinders of the East
• Demon Subquest - Holy Will and Profane Dissent

name: Gimmick! 2
description: Embark on a sparkling journey in this long-awaited sequel to SUNSOFT’s legendary 8-bit platformer Gimmick! Solve puzzles, trick enemies, and explore a physics-based playground. Yumetaro is back!

name: Galaxy Flavored Heroes
description: Join our Heroes in this top-down 2D action-adventure game as you shoot your way through baddies then rumble it out with a boss fight. Select any stage and show 'em a fight!! Part of a Complete Breakfast!!

name: Happy Sawland
description: Embark on a journey to reach the far lands of «Happy Sawland». Go forth, the seeker of «Happy Sawland». No hesitation before the many challenges you are to come across! Jump and dodge until the goal is reached!

name: Kiborg: Arena
description: Fight for cash and glory in a prison planet’s Coliseum in this free prologue to KIBORG, the fast-paced action rogue-lite with brutal, cybernetic-enhanced combat.

name: Knyaz' Vladimir
description: Knyaz' Vladimir is an action platformer for Windows based on the cartoon of the same name, developed by PiPE Studio and published by 1C on May 5, 2006.

name: 10 Gnomes 1: The Rooftops
description: For all of You that enjoyed search for secret items in Submachines, or the bird quest in DayMare Town. This is a game created entirely on the idea of finding hidden objects (Gnomes in this case). You have 10 minutes to find 10 Gnomes – navigate via the normal point and click manner.

name: Sentimental Gensoukyou
description: A mysterious letter comes to Rinnosuke and written on it is, "You're boring!". Filled with anger, he travels around Gensokyo visiting all the girls in order to find the sender. Sentimental Gensoukyou is short adventure visual novel developed by Seventh Heaven Maxion using Live Maker engine. The game features 12 different scenes which can be choosen freely by player to determine route and storylines.

name: Harold's Walk
description: Harold's Walk on Steam is a remaster of the original Harold's Walk game that debuted on the Nintendo 3ds in 2020. Odd and unusual spaces comprise most of your journey as you venture through this surreal collectathon.

name: 10 Gnomes 2: Walk In the Park
description: Second episode in the 10 Gnomes series. Once again your task is to find 10 of those pesky gnomes in less than 10 minutes.

name: Crista Caelestis
description: A 4-player fighting game based on Raknarok Online.

name: Fallendom
description: Fallendom is a doujin action RPG developed and published by Platine Dispositif in 2013

name: Divinastros
description: An astronomical gambling game. Fight the Olimpians while each Zodiac sign affects your cards differently in a deeply satisfying deckbuilder game. Fight Greek beasts, discover Tarot Cards and climb the Olimpus searching for revenge.

name: Nyan Nyan Parasol
description: Sin descripción

name: Scorchie Adventures
description: A platformer game in which you play as Scorchie, a friendly and hyperactive will-o'-wisp who's able to pass through a variety of obstacles using their dash ability and fire properties.

name: Sleep Simulator
description: Sleep Simulator is a cozy real-time strategy game in which you sleep.

name: Compton's Interactive Encyclopedia
description: CIE Sega CD captures the imagination and inspires the mind - all from the convenience of your television screen. With the simple click of the arrow key, you can take a ride through history. Visit the farthest corner of the globe, share the mystery and majesty of the wild kingdom, and explore the vast reaches of outer space. The articles of the complete 26 volumes of Compton's Encyclopedia plus pictures, sounds, movies, and slide-shows are now available in CIE Sega CD!

name: After Burner 3D
description: Sin descripción

name: Escape Simulator: PowerWash DLC
description: Experience a brand new escape room set in the iconic PowerWash garage! Play solo or in co-op, in VR or flat mode. Solve tricky puzzles, clean away grime for clues, and enjoy new 3D editor props with a rocking new soundtrack.

name: Twinetroid
description: In the 80s and 90s, Japanese publishing company Futabasha released a series of gamebook adaptations of various video games. Part of their "Famicom Game Book Series" was January of 1987's "Metroid: Zebes Invasion Order", written by Nobuyuki Shioda and illustrated by Arisaka Sumi. The game book is a retelling of the original Metroid video game, with an extra adventure taking place as part of an expanded ending sequence. Twinetroid is a conversion of this gamebook into interactive fiction game engine Twine. The game is freely available online at Metroid fansite Metroid Database.

name: Inspector Schmidt: The Ebbing
description: It's the year 1870. You have to solve the mysterious death of Bente Hansen: question the villagers, detect clues, combine them to new information and decipher the mysterious signals that arrive at the station of the first transatlantic telegraph cable in a little village on the North Sea coast.

name: Riddle Tower
description:
Will you manage to help Prince Monkid, dear friend?
Climb all levels to finish the game. In the levels you will find fun riddles, math puzzles and complex rebus. Just be patient because some are really hard.

Solve your daily riddle to climb to the top and if you stuck don't worry as if you use some hints you get riddles and answers to help you continue your journey.

name: Bubsy in: the Purrfect Collection
description:
Is Bubsy a celebrated icon from the mascot wars of the early 90s or a platforming punchline? The team at Limited Run has built a new collection to find the answer. Bubsy in: The Purrfect Collection explores the franchise's troubled history and enduring popularity.

Bubsy in: The Purrfect Collection is a playable history that includes games, artifacts and interviews. All of the games have been carefully updated for modern PCs and consoles using Limited Run’s proprietary Carbon Engine. Along the way the team was able to smooth out some of the games’ rough edges.

At the helm of the project is Limited Run’s Audi Sorlie, a producer, author, Bubsy World Heavyweight Champion and arguably the world’s foremost expert on the furry franchise. Together with the team at Limited Run and Atari, he has created the ultimate retrospective celebration of Bubsy, the 3’6” tall 80 pound bobcat (with a pet armadillo named Arnold). What could possibly go wrong?

name: Demons
description: Demons is a co-op horror card game for 1-4 players. An evil cult tries to unleash an ancient demon and all that stands between them and the apocalypse is you, your friends and a deck of cards.

name: Mega Man World 2
description: A full GBC conversion for Mega Man World 2 by SpecialAgentApe, with an included soundtrack hack by forple.

name: Final Fantasy Adventure DX
description: A full colorization of Final Fantasy Adventure for Game Boy Color version. Also includes a new world map and many bug fixes.

name: Stickers for You
description: This game was created for game streamers. It is nothing but pain. We do not recommend purchasing this game except for distributors. All you have to do is collect 100 stickers hidden in a closed city. But you probably won't be able to complete it alone.

name: Seiken Densetsu: Final Fantasy Gaiden
description: A mobile phone port of Final Fantasy Adventure that was released in Japan as part of the World of Mana project.

name: Hooked!
description:
An 18+ Visual Novel set in the early 2000s, about three girls trying to make their way into the adult entertainment industry! They meet you, a clueless fisherman, who has no idea about his potential.

Get to know the girls closely, and make fun naughty videos with them! It's a comedic, lighthearted and goofy story filled with lewd stuff!

name: The World Ends With You: Noise Busters
description: A Score-Attack Arcade game with RPG features based on the cult classic, The World Ends With You.

name: Puzzle Kids
description:
Help your old mysterious grandfather to sort through his basement of relics and put together all those puzzles he hasn’t had time to piece together yet!

You better hurry though because time is running out, and you may have to sacrifice something valuable to keep going.

Puzzle kids is a local multiplayer game where you and three others must work together to finish jigsaw puzzles by picking up and placing down pieces.

But the light is slowly going out and you need to burn things to keep it alive.

Complete a majority of the puzzle to proceed to the next one. In levels with multiple puzzles you have to build the correct puzzle in the correct frame.

name: Cart To The End
description: Cart To The End is a First-Person Multiplayer Game where you must ride all the way to the end avoiding different kinds of obstacles and escaping other players which can kill you and make you suffer.

name: Drifter
description: Drifter is an immersive, dialogue-driven first person experience with psychedelically dazzling lo-fi environments and effects. Interact via branching dialogue and explore surreal environments in this compacted, narrative-led adventure.

name: Ace Combat 3: Electrosphere
description:
Ace Combat 3: Electrosphere is a combat flight simulation video game developed by Namco for the PlayStation. The third game in the Ace Combat franchise, it was released in Europe and North America in 2000 and was localized for specific regions.

Players control an aircraft and must complete various mission objectives, such as destroying squadrons of enemies or protecting a base from enemy fire. Electrosphere carries a more futuristic science fiction-inspired landscape and world compared to the modern-day theme of its predecessors.

The international version of Ace Combat 3 differs significantly from the japanese release: its campaign has 36 out of the original 52 missions with no different paths. The story, as well as all related voice acting and cutscenes, was removed and replaced with a more basic story with no voice acting.

name: Raccooneering
description:
Build. Flail around wildly. Rebuild. Help Björn the raccoon build the ultimate escape vehicle out of garbage.

*Raccooneering* was made in 5 days in Jaunpils Castle for Castle Game Jam 2023.

name: Viva Veloce
description: Viva Veloce is a retro top-down street racing game with everything modernized. Race! Earn money! And be the king of the streets of Rome with your tuned, 4 wheeled, monster.

name: Turnabout of the Final Day
description:
The Final Day is coming.

Losing someone... dear to you, will always make our life hell for a long time. The pain can heal, new memories can be crafted, but scars, remains.

This is a story about how Athena Cykes, the young attorney, started to lose Everything, and how she deals with it... Or tries to.

name: Athena Cykes: Ace Attorney - Locks on the Heart
description:
LotH takes place in 2029, after the events of Spirit of Justice.

Athena Cykes takes on a case where a double murder has been committed at VideoVention, an online video convention, and one of her close friends is suspected of being the culprit. Shortly after taking her friend's defense, Athena gets wind of a case involving an evasive serial killer named the Executioner, who has been at large for a very long time and seems to be uncatchable.

name: KittyToy
description: Take care of and adopt stray kitties. Buy toys and decorations for your house and yard!

name: A Turnabout Called Justice
description: Months after the conclusion of the trial of Athena Cykes, Trucy Wright has finally regained the Gramarye Rights and plans a brand new show to revive the Gramarye Miracle. What follows is a devastating accident-turned-murder, leaving it up to Apollo Justice and Athena Cykes to find justice or doom the legal system to darkness forever.

name: Super Smash Bros Ultimate: Marie Outfit and Wig
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Smash Bros Ultimate: Morgana Hat
description: Sin descripción

name: Shadow Trick
description: Turn into a shadow and clear all the levels. Shadow Trick is a cute platformer game starring a wizard able to switch between the real world and the shadow realm. Keep an eye on your shadow and don't let your eyes trick you!

name: Contra Online
description: Sin descripción

name: Hidden Cats: Pirates
description: Dive into the enchanting world of "Cats & Seek - Pirates" a hidden object game where your mission is to uncover every cat hidden within stunning hand-painted artwork. Let your keen eye and curiosity guide you through this captivating journey.

name: Cock
description: Do you like Cocks and clicking? then this game is just for you! Click to make your cock bigger and earn new cocks every couple hours by playing.

name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Zootopia Defence
description: A fangame based on the Ace Attorney series. It was created using the Ace Attorney Online trial editor. An incident brings upcoming lawyer Phoenix Wright and famed prosecutor Miles Edgeworth to the city of Zootopia where they must navigate a culture similar and yet completely different to their own.

name: Set Yourself on Fire
description: A linear visual novel. ------ A quiet town awaits death. Stagnation is the default state of being. Two aimless young women fall in love.

name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Zootopia Defence 2: Hunt For Justice
description: The sequel to Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Zootopia Defence, set after Dual Destinies, focusing more on Apollo and Athena.

name: Champion of Turnabouts
description: Rumors in the underworld have been circulating about an undefeated Poker player who's never lost in seven years. Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to put an end to that streak, and write the story of a new Poker legend.

name: The Enchanted Turnabout
description: The local baker of Labyrinthia stands against the Knights of the Inquisition to prove that the daughter of a wealthy landlady is not actually a witch.

name: The Secret Turnabout
description: There is no such thing as a flawless system. No matter how we delude ourselves, the cracks will always appear. When that time comes for it to crumble under the weight of failed expectations, will you salvage the remains? Or, will you pretend that it was all just a bad dream?

name: TTT: The Torrential Turnabout
description: TTT (aka The Torrential Turnabout) is an Ace Attorney-style fangame. The game takes heavy inspiration from various mystery visual novels from the late 2000s and early 2010s such as Zero Escape, Danganronpa, and Umineko and celebrates what it was like to grow up with these stories.

name: Reimu Needs Help!? Aunn-chan to the Rescue!
description:
This is a Touhou Project fan game in which the player tries to help Hakurei Reimu, who is in trouble, with items completed in a slot.
The main character in this game is Komano Aun.

name: Turnabout Reality
description: Phoenix Wright must defend a man accused of attacking his daughter in front of school grounds. Facing off against an unfamiliar prosecutor, Phoenix discovers that things aren't exactly as they seem in this case. Or in this world, for that matter.

name: Poultry Princess
description:
What a day for Princess Guinevere! Knight Arthur arrives tomorrow for their wedding, but she was cursed during the night and she woke up as a cute little chicken!

Will Guinevere manage to find the culprit and restore herself to her human form...or will she fall in love with one of Poultry Princess' 3 love interests on her way?!

name: Turnabout Retribution
description:
The road to hell is paved with good intentions...

Kristoph Gavin is willing to go to hell and back in order to get his revenge on Phoenix Wright.

Even if it means making a deal to get it...

Even if it means getting entangled in the most diabolical court case he's ever seen...

But even then, will he succeed?

name: Turnabout for Human Rights
description: You play as defense attorney Evan Denceforge. He goes on an adventure with his friend to go on a ghost hunt and ride shopping carts or whatever. They stop doing it, however, because of a stool.

name: Beatrice Verdict: Ace Attorney - The Hidden Truth
description: Beatrice Verdict Ace Attorney: The Hidden Truth, is a fangame set after the third game in the original Ace Attorney Trilogy, Phoenix Wright Ace Attorney: Trials and Tribulations.

name: Turnabout of Courage
description: A Ace Attorney fan case inspired by "Hag's Nook" and "The Case of the Constant Suicides" by John Dickson Carr. Set in a alternative universe with Mia and Phoenix investigating a case.

name: Turnabout Pairs
description: An independent sequel to Turnabout of Courage, following Mia on a new case.

name: Ms. Pac-Man: Maze Madness 2
description: Sin descripción

name: New Super Mario Bros. Versus: Doodler's Mayhem
description: A mod for Mario Vs Luigi that adds multiple new stages and characters ft. Green Greens and many others

name: Box It Up! Inc.
description: From the creator of Tape it Up!, a unique action-puzzle game has arrived! You need to pack the boxes up ASAP! How far can you go with these messy boxes?

name: MTV Sports: Pure Ride
description: MTV Sports: Pure Ride is a snowboarding video game developed by Visual Impact and published by THQ for the Game Boy Color in 2000.

name: Bread Fish Clicker
description: A simple and fun game where players click on a fish and a piece of bread to increase their respective counters.

name: Airplane Tycoon
description: Airline Tycoon is a business simulation game by Thomas Holz and Robert Kleinert, in which the player must successfully manage an airline. The original was developed by Spellbound Entertainment, and published by Infogrames Deutschland, however, the succeeding versions were published by a variety of publishers.

name: Airplane Tycoon: First Class
description: In 2001, two years after its German release (and three years after the series' inception), Airline Tycoon First Class was the first installment to be released in English by Monte Cristo. As it was the first game in the series to be released in the United States and the United Kingdom, the publisher decided to remove First Class subtitle from the game box and manuals, though it remained in-game. Features added in First Class include ten brand new missions, multiplayer mode with up to 4 players, new MIDI music, cargo transportation and more.

name: Airplane Tycoon: Evolution
description: In 2002, Airline Tycoon Evolution, second Airline Tycoon re-release was published by Monte Cristo. The game introduced ten new missions, possibility of buying self-designed aircraft (and possibility of sharing these planes via Internet), possibility of hiring aircraft security agents, five new sabotages and more.

name: Afterlife: Rickard's Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Baoxiao Chuji
description: Sin descripción

name: AlterEgo City
description: Welcome to Centennial City – Your Ultimate Virtual Playground! Centennial City invites you to experience a virtual life beyond imagination. Embrace your digital self in this vibrant world, where your avatar, mystical soul creature AlterEgo, and a community of friends come alive. Customize your personal space for an extraordinary existence and leave behind the feeling of solitude.

name: War of Legends
description: A free-to-play browser-based MMORTS set in "a world of ancient Chinese mythology"

name: The Scrapper
description: The ninth game released by Gotmail, in collaboration with Sugiura Metals Company. This game was never translated into English. The player must solve a mystery in a scrapyard.

name: Peer to Peer
description:
Your choices define who you are. But what if you don't make them consciously?

Peer To Peer is a short first-person social experiment where the player gets to experience situations where they'll have to pick which scenario they want to unfold. There is no traditional win-or-lose situation here, the player leaves with a newfound sense of their own personal behaviour.

name: Ultimate Indie Racing
description: An Arcade Racer with 40 Indiegame Characters to play and Race Tracks inspired by Indiegame Worlds. Explore the ULTIMATE Indie Experience!

name: Fighting Force Collection
description: Who doesn’t love a good brawler? In Fighting Force, you and up two three friends have a simple, four step strategy: break things, get weapons, use those weapons to pummel people, and repeat as needed. It’s straightforward streetside carnage with a 3D flair.

name: Grocery Simulator
description: Experience the thrill of managing your own grocery store, from stocking shelves to handling customers, and transforming a small shop into a thriving supermarket. Control prices, Order goods, Hire Staff, Fight with Thieves and much more.

name: Magic Star
description:
Idol development system, popular social music game! Welcome everyone to Nico's singing and dancing world~

Magic Star is a music game with a lively style using the concept of idols!
Gorgeous costumes, personalized mounts, massive music songs, everything you want is here. Scroll down quickly and let Nico introduce it to you, idols!

name: Sealed
description: Sealed is a horror game that will immerse you in a disturbing and mysterious experience. You will find yourself trapped in a haunted hospital, where every shadow and every whisper will remind you that you are not alone.

name: Quest for the Golden Chalice
description:
Dragons and castles and bats... Oh my!

The cowardly Prince of Larosia will need to face his deepest fears, as his kingdom has been overrun by a group of hungry dragons! Even worse, the evil mastermind behind this attack is none other than Mardok the wizard, who the Prince had banished a year before! The townspeople - including the royal guards - have all fled the kingdom, leaving the Prince alone to fend for himself, and even worse, Mardok has stolen the Golden Chalice, the greatest treasure of Larosia! It now falls to the Prince to restore the people's confidence in his royalty, and there's only one way to do it: He must return the Golden Chalice to the Yellow Castle!

Guide the Prince as he runs across the kingdom, locating keys, a sword and other assorted objects, in an effort to locate the Golden Chalice and carry it back home. Don't let the dragons get too close, or they will have the Prince for lunch! Also be wary of the giant bat, who will steal objects and move them around, causing the Prince additional headaches!

name: Storyshift Asriel Battle!
description: Finally your little journey through Snowdin has come to an end. But there's still one obstacle on your way. This adorable fluffy monster means no harm to you, but it's your duty to finish his game with you. Give him what he wants!

name: Knight Guy in Low Res World: Castle Days
description: Knight Guy in Low Res World: Castle Days is a platformer with some metroidvania elements. Knight Guy's pet (either a dog or a cat) has been kidnapped by an evil dragon, and he has to explore a castle with 100 rooms in order to find and rescue his pet. He must do this within a one hour time limit, all while dealing with the evil dragon and his minions.

name: Meteor Shower
description: Meteors are falling to Earth! Defend Earth's surface by blasting away at the falling rocks... But beware! Alien forces have learned what was happening and are taking advantage of our vulnerability to attack us!

name: Marvel's Moon Girl and Devil Dinosaur: Moon Girl Moxie!
description: Team up with Moon Girl and Devil Dinosaur to catch some baddies!

name: Pokémon Eclesia
description: Pokémon Ecclesia is a Pokémon fangame created by pingupollas. This game combines humorous elements with a serious main plot and innovative mechanics. It is heavily influenced by OT, as well as the games Fear and Hunger and Bloodborne.

name: Lucky Hunter
description: Lucky Hunter is a deck-building auto battler Roguelike game. Your pieces are automatically played on the board, and players will focus on building unique decks and relics, making the best of the synergies between pieces to defeat increasingly powerful prey.

name: Doki-Doki Pretty League: Nekketsu Otome Seishunki
description:
Doki Doki Pretty League is the second game in the baseball simulation games released by Xing Entertainment for the Playstation console. In this sequel the game features new team members.

In the game the player takes the role of a baseball coach that is going to coach the Kasumigaura high school female baseball team during a one year period of time. In the game the player decides the training (battling, fielding, etc.) that each player is going to make during each week and can see the progress of his players seeing if the players stats are increasing of not.

Other thing is about the match's days: During each match the player can decide the type of throwing that his player is going to do, or the type of at-bat that his player is going to make.

The game features also conversations with the team members, the staff room (where the player can take decisions about the team or talk with them) and events like the high school summer festival, the Valentine's Day and other events that takes part in the dating part of the game.

The game features Japanese voices for the team members.

name: Pandoland
description: A new mobile game developed by Game Freak in collaboration with WonderPlanet

name: Nehonobasa
description:
This is a bullet hell shooter. It might be hard.
Defeat all 4 stages + the final boss.
Shoot bombs with the X key. Shooting a bomb into a bomb
will increase the attack range and wipe out all bullets and enemies on the screen.
Also, if you have at least one bomb
even if you get hit, you won't miss because it will be an auto bomb.

name: ChatTDT: Tower Defense Twitch
description: Dive into the dynamic world of "ChatTDT: Tower Defense Twitch" where your Twitch chat becomes an integral part of the action! Designed to seamlessly integrate with the Twitch API, ChatTDT offers a unique and interactive tower defense experience that engages both streamers and viewers like never before.

name: Onsen Nozokimi Daisakusen
description: Onsen Nozokimi Daisakusen is a flash game in the Persona series available on the official Atlus website made to promote the release of Persona 4.

name: TC!Underfell
description: Welcome to Underfell, an alternate universe of Undertale where the various monsters in the underground are vicious, where the law Kill or be Killed was firmly established. Never has the monster race been so divided before, gangs, mobs, a once united kingdom has now fallen and erupted into pure chaos. Can you survive the horrors of the underground?

name: Tender Frame Cocoon: //Rhapsody of Cross-Pollination
description:
Deidamia Leonte has crash-landed on a desert planet... alongside the leader of the warring faction's elite cell.

The newest chapter in the long-running TENDER FRAME franchise is here.

name: Great Time Trio Remake
description: The events of the game take place after a temporal paradox caused by the Anomaly/Player, this event causes the judges from the Underfell, Fellswap & Storyfell universe to come together in a single timeline to fight the player together.

name: Reminisce
description:
Remembrance. Requiem. Rebirth. Repeat.
A (mostly) linear 500-word collection of microstories created for the 2024 Neo-Twiny Jam.

name: Byflvgvr
description: Armed with one of those Electric Fly Zappers, Protect your delicious food from nasty and hungry bugs. Survive long enough and kill enough bugs to move onto the next level. Your bug zapper uses a LOT of ELECTRICITY; so be sure to pick up lighting bolts to recharge your zapper.

name: Desktop Pals
description: Desktop Pals is a simple 2D Game which allows you to share your desktop and interact with a cute cat! Scratch the cat when it is looking for love and hear it purr!

name: Kiwi
description: Play as a Kiwi bird surfing down an ancient and holy Kiwi tree (the homeland of the Kiwi birds) to escape and gain your freedom. Little do you know, it is a magical and endless tree, and your quest for freedom is but a simple dream. Of course, your endless surfing is not fruitless, for once you tire and trip from a knot of the tree bark, you split in half, becoming a delicious kiwi for the hoomans to enjoy.

name: Kiwi Game
description: KIWI GAME is a game about kiwis. Two in fact. One to be rescued from the evil farmer who thirsts for the sacred power of kiwis, and the other to explore a metroidvania-lite map by gaining new abilities, braving challenges and outsmarting puzzles in order to find the one she loves.

name: Kiwi: Airborne
description: Kiwi: Airborne, is a 2D side-scroller, made with Godot, in which you help a Kiwi fulfill its dream of flight; made for the 2020 Open Jam in a weekend, inspired by the short film Kiwi!

name: Kiwis Can't Fly
description:
Everyone knows that kiwis can’t fly…

Kiwis Can't Fly is a short musical story about a flightless kiwi bird who loves the sky. Drag various objects into Kiwi's path to bounce off of them during its adventure through the sky.

Kiwis Can't Fly was developed by DDRKirby(ISQ) and Kat Jia, under the Cocoa Moss label. It was originally developed in 72 hours as an entry for round 50 of the Ludum Dare game jam. The theme was "Delay the Inevitable".

name: Idle Knight RPG
description:
Idle Knight RPG is offering great experience for RPG lovers.
You will enjoy many type of good looking items , dungeons, global boss, pets , potions , skins and competitive leaderboard.
It is designed to be f2p , less ads and quite battery friendly.
You can simply put your phone aside and enjoy auto farming while you are having your daily life.

name: Mandela Effect Brain Test
description: Test your mind with over 350+ Mandela Effect examples.

name: Minecraftle
description: Minecraftle is a Wordle clone based on Minecraft. The game has you guess the item based on it's crafting recipe.

name: Let's Learn Japanese! Complete Collection
description: A bundle of every game of the Let's Learn Japanese! series.

name: 50 Floors: The Paranormal Investigators Prologue
description:
After a conversation with President of Underwood Corporation, you must urgently go to the studio for the shooting of a new episode of the Paranormal Investigators TV show. Unfortunately, the elevator is broken and you need to go through 50 floors on the stairs, but there are 3 simple rules:

1. If there is no anomaly, go down to the floor below.
2. If there is an anomaly, return to the floor above.
3. The corridor is safe, but if it changes, the rules will change.

50 Floors: The Paranormal Investigators Prologue is inspired by games like The Stanley Parable, PT, The Exit 8, and narrates what happened a couple of hours before the events in the Paranormal Investigators.

name: Risk of Rain 2: Devotion Update
description: Packed with an array of exciting content, this free update addresses various item and map bugs across both the base game and the Survivors of the Void expansion. It also includes a super awesome collaboration…..

name: Troll Face Quest: Game of Trolls
description: Troll Face Quest - a popular series of adventure quests distinguishing feature of which is a huge amount of humor, a hilarious cast of characters and dozens of funny situations. Troll Face Quest: Game of Trolls - a new part of the franchise, this time the developers have borrowed a number of popular themes from movies, comics and fairy tales, thus building a logical story of passing which you have to go through about a dozen different worlds. The developers kept the General atmosphere, graphics and characters.

name: Slot Waste
description: An episode-length first-person factory simulation. Navigate through a series of 10 unique and weird mini-games. What are you producing and who are you making it for?

name: KiwiFlight
description:
A Kiwi looks upon the sky, with dreams to fly, and one day gets a chance to make its dreams a reality when it gets tossed into a world of forgotten warriors and broken dreams.

KiwiFlight is a 2D, Platformer, Metroidvania game, made with the Unity Engine, taking heavy inspiration from Hollow Knight, Ori and the Blind Forest, and the works of H.P Lovecraft.

Was created from a 2-man team, consisting of myself and a fellow classmate. Created for our Final Year Project in the span of less than 3 months.

name: Omega No Sunshine 2
description:
Omega No Sunshine , second game of the title, is an arcade collecthation game where players have to travel through different places in order to collect sun rings. Humanity is destroying their own world and an another time, it need someone able to collect them all and restore the sun to shine again.

This title was delisted and later republished in 2025 as a new release and self-published by Galoxyum with ongoing updates and features.

name: As Aventuras de Kiwi
description: Game developed by IPAE for creationist week 2022.

name: Starborn Survivor
description: Sin descripción

name: Fate/Samurai Remnant: Additional Episode 3 - Record's Fragment: Bailong and the Crimson Demon
description:
Mysteriously disappearing children. Rumors of evil spirits in Yoshiwara.
A strange voice calling out to Miyamoto Iori. A suddenly attacking bird monster.

In the midst of all these strange incidents, Yui Shousetsu appears in the form of a child and declares that if nothing is done, Edo will be destroyed.

With the Spirit Font in turmoil, aspirants of the Waxing Moon join together to face a new anomaly.

Among them is a newly arrived Servant, an unrivaled spear-wielder, Rogue Rider Zhao Yun.
“Feel the sting of Zhao Zilong's spear!”

name: Kiwi Life
description: Sin descripción

name: Burden of Truth
description: The Burden of Proof saga continues! Step into the shoes of legendary prosecutor Conrad Cross during a pivotal moment of his journey. Investigate crime scenes, solve mysteries using evidence, and make your case in the courtroom. The burden lies with you to unravel the truth!

name: Kiwi Khaos
description:
Short little MSX game made by me and Lihpten. Made entirely over the 2ish weeks of the 1st Retro Platform Jam, with our progress streamed every few days on my Twitch channel for long, messy hours. This was our first time messing with MPAGD and it certainly shows. We had a lot of fun and would love to make more, especially whenever an MSX2 engine rolls around.

This release is stripped back compared to some earlier builds as it's more optimized for playability and less glitches, though it certainly has its fair share still. In the future we'll most likely be adding music (which was planned but scrapped at the last second due to scheduling conflicts), fixing many bugs, adding a Screen 2 intro screen, re-implementing a double jump (which was swapped to a high jump last second due to glitches), finishing the ZX spectrum port, and prettying up the graphics/animation.

name: Kiwi Hop
description:
Embark on an exhilarating adventure with KiwiHop, where you take command of New Zealand's diverse bird species and navigate the challenges of survival in the stunning NZ bush. Explore the unique world of native New Zealand birds while enjoying an educational twist – uncover fascinating facts about these avian wonders after every gaming session. Immerse yourself in both entertainment and learning as you hop through the captivating landscapes of KiwiHop!

KiwiHop is completely ad and micro-transaction free for piece of mind.

name: Kiwi In Arms
description:
The kiwi took the arms !

Use your arms to defeat that mighty eagle !

name: Kiwi Climber
description: Can a kiwi climb a mountain?

name: Raid on Tri City
description:
Raid on Tricity is an Atari Lynx ROM intended to be played on real Lynx via a flashcard or on an emulator on other devices.

The game come in 2 versions :

"Second Wave" is for sale on Yastuna Games store, and add a Story mode to the Arcade experience. It is now also available as free download.

"First Contact" is only digital and free on itch.io, feature only Arcade mode

What's new in Raid on TriCity - First Impact, compared to the previous version:
- Game is more punchy now,
- Bombs explode when they hit the ground, so be careful,
- Leaderboard

name: Sticker Clicker
description:
Sticker Clicker is a hidden object game with 150 different stickers.

It was developed during the Global Game Jam. The theme was Lost & Found.

name: Blinky Bill's Ghost Cave
description: Blink Bill's Ghost Cave is an interactive story book with some smaller games and activities besides the main story.

name: A Human Haunting!
description: A hidden object game where a ghost looks for signs of a human haunting!

name: Capture the Intelligence
description: A relaxing night of Capture the Flag turns into a night of terror for the BLU Spy. Crawl through five levels of familiar Source Engine environments and avoid the twisted RED team as you try to, of course, capture the intelligence. Can you survive? Will you capture the fabled intelligence?

name: Dragon Age II: Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Tsurikkuma
description: Tsurikkuma is one of the games that can be played on Nico Nico Live.

name: Sonic 2: Return to Westside Island
description: Sonic 2: Return to Westside Island is a ROM hack of Sonic the Hedgehog 2 for the Sega Mega Drive/Genesis focusing on level layout changes to the majority of the original game.

name: Arkyos Angel
description: Sin descripción

name: Dynasty Warriors 8: Xu Shu 'Kisaragi Ritsu' Costume
description: Sin descripción

name: Off Air
description: Jump, slide, and smash your way through an arena of blood thirsty robots in Off Air. A first person shooter where there are only two rule: Survive and Smile for the camera. Use your wits and speed and dodge around waves of enemies in an ever devolving world of chaos and lead.

name: Dream Gen
description: Build your dreams in this polyrhythm designer. Dream Gen is all about crafting relaxing or chaotic melodies, which can be played out for hours on end.

name: Adventures in the Magic Kingdom: Sora Edition
description: A hackrom of Adventures in the Magic Kingdom

name: The Maestromusic
description: The Maestromusic is a rhythm game that comes bundled with a conductor baton controller. In order to play the game, you have to wave the baton at the right speed and with the right amount of force in order to match the game's desired tempo and volume for the length of a song. Depending on how accurate you are with each swing, the game will either grant or subtract points and if you run out of points, you'll fail the song. At the end of a song, you're ranked based on your overall accuracy. The game is divided into Rehearsal and Concert modes that each have their own sets of songs from famous composers. In each mode, you need to complete three songs before the credits will roll. Once songs are played in the main modes, you can replay them as you please in the Free Mode and also read information on each of the game's featured composers.

name: Woodworm
description: Move a worm to carve the object across 17 thrilling levels!!

name: Rosa's Garden
description:
A calm gardening game.

Rosas Garden is a calm and poetic flower game about gardening with roses. Dig little holes in the ground, find seeds, plant them and watch how slowly a rose grows. By combining fully blossomed roses, you can breed new seeds. There are over 40 combinations available and each rose is named after a famous women, paying a small tribute to their lives and achievements.

name: Sloppy Forgeries
description: Sloppy Forgeries is a fast-paced, two-player local multiplayer painting game. Each player is given a mouse, a blank canvas, and a few simple paint tools. Each round, a famous painting from art history is revealed. Players race to copy the painting as quickly and accurately as possible.

name: Small Talk
description: Sin descripción

name: Uprooted
description:
Uprooted is a 2D platformer that explores themes of assimilation and heritage loss common to immigrant narratives by forcing the player to sacrifice abilities in order to progress through the world.

As part of a fully POC team completely new to game development, we drew heavily from our own experiences and those of our parents to craft this game. Just as the player finds it exponentially more difficult to accomplish previously simple tasks with the loss of each ability, some of our parents, for instance, struggled with language barriers that made even setting up simple doctors appointments (or self-advocacy at them) daunting. In just ten short weeks, we set out to replicate their experience.

Join Dru as she faces the same trials, leaving everything she knows behind and sacrificing both her native tongue and abilities in order to pursue a new life elsewhere.

name: High Sidin'
description: High Sidin' is a 1v1 drifting co-op game where players rack up points "swinging" their cars in an arena called the ring while onlookers get hyphy.

name: Glowface
description: Sin descripción

name: Cazzarion: Ship Hunting
description: Sin descripción

name: Kingdom's Dungeon Rage
description: The king have been taken hostage and locked inside a Dungeon! A dungeon that changes each time you die or complete a level. Complete in challenging different ways to escape, from becoming invisible, turning the world upside down and a lot more - your only goal is to escape without rage quitting.

name: Supermarket Owner Simulator: Business
description: Welcome to Supermarket Owner Simulator: Business, the ultimate supermarket management experience! Step into the shoes of a budding supermarket manager and embark on an exciting journey to build and manage your supermarket empire. Your adventure begins with the opportunity to design and customize your supermarket from the ground up. From choosing the perfect layout to picking the products that will fly off the shelves, every decision you make will shape the success of your store.

name: Infinite Inside
description:
Explore a serene and mysterious world, collect shards, solve intricate puzzles, and assemble keys to unlock the mysteries of a secret society.

Escape into five enchanting labyrinths, each filled with secrets hidden in every corner that are key to unlocking the mystery hidden within the 'Plinth'. Designed to fully utilise new mixed reality headsets to deliver an immersive VR and MR (Mixed Reality) gameplay.

Use intuitive hand tracking to manipulate 3D geometric puzzles, build keys, and interact with the game world.

name: 11 Years
description: 11 Years is a 3D marine survival game where you play as a Clownfish trying to survive from the direct and indirect human influences on the coral reef ecosystem. The player will experience phenomena such as ocean acidification, coral bleaching, ghost nets, and dead zones to see how each harmfully affects both the reef and its inhabitants. Through our educational narrative and various collectibles, we aim to educate players about the dire situation in our marine ecosystems. 11 Years intends to both contribute to the climate change dialogue as well as convey the experiences wildlife animals have to endure because of human impact.

name: Guess The Object
description: Sin descripción

name: Mars Mayhem: Shooter Simulator Warfare
description: Sin descripción

name: Urban Skater: Skateboard Delivery City Challenge
description: Welcome to Urban Skater - Skateboard Delivery City Challenge, an adrenaline-fueled adventure that puts you on wheels – or rather, a board – like never before! Strap on your helmet, grab your skateboard, and prepare to become the fastest (and coolest) food delivery person in town. Race against time, weave through bustling city streets, and deliver piping hot meals to hungry customers in this fast-paced and exhilarating experience.

name: Te Amo Mamá
description: Te Amo Mamá is a 2D side scroller that exposes players to the (often underrepresented) experience of motherhood. Become a mother hen who guides and protects her chick as they make their way back to their flock.

name: Oak Beats
description: Sin descripción

name: 2 American
description: 2 American is a dialogue centered side scroller where you play as Ashley Trinh, a first-gen Asian American, who has trouble communicating to her immigrant parents due to a language and cultural barrier. In this game, we highlight the frustration of having decisions made for you and not knowing how to talk to your parents about it. 2 American serves as a window into some of the hardships a child of immigrants born in America might have to deal with in their immigrant household such as not understanding what your parents are saying when they speak to you, being compared to your more successful cousin, and arguing about what career you must have in the future.

name: Zombie Survival
description: This is the first game where the theme is literally zombie survival. No Humans Allowed, except as the main course. An apocalyptic city building survival game where you grow the zombie horde and take over the world.

name: Illuminate
description: Illuminate is an immersive 2D platformer where one plays as a lightbulb who must endure a journey through the streets of the Mission District. Throughout the game the lightbulb is following his family's trail, who have disappeared from Mission District due to displacement.

name: Radikal Fighters
description:
Radikal Fighters is an exciting action game with vibrant, cartoonish visuals, that offers two thrilling game modes:

Battle Royale: Dive into a chaotic free-for-all where only the last fighter standing wins. Explore the vibrant streets of Radikal City, filled with surprises and hazards. Use your unique perks, weapons, and gear to outsmart and outfight other players in fast-paced, intense battles.

Paint Rush: Engage in an exhilarating team-based mode where three teams compete to dominate the arena by coloring as many dots as possible in their team's colors. Collaborate with your teammates, strategize to cover the most ground, and thwart your opponents' efforts in this fast-paced, color-splattered frenzy.

Get ready to jump into the action and prove your skills in the absurd world of Radikal Fighters!

name: Monster Musume Fantastic Life
description: Monster Musume Fantastic Life is a simulation gacha game based on "Monster Musume" by Okayado.

name: Airline Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Nightshift Galaxy
description: Play as a freelance mecha-pilot in a satirical anime-scifi setting. Arcade-style combat with transforming-robots, spider-tanks, and high-speed fighter-jets.

name: Wonder Wander
description: Become a Trekker and chill out while exploring the world in Wonder Wander, a relaxed and easy-going idle adventure game! Take a break from your busy life, discover hidden wonders and meet other friendly Trekkers, and explore at your own pace without breaking a sweat!

name: Garfield, Eat Your Words
description: Garfield, Eat Your Words is a 1985 educational video game by Random House for the Apple II series of computers based on the Garfield franchise.

name: Garfield Double Dares
description: Garfield Double Dares is a 1985 educational video game by Random House for the Apple II series of computers and the Commodore 64 based on the Garfield franchise.

name: Crockpot
description: Discussion.

name: Polynya
description:
THE DAY IS BEAUTIFUL. YOUR LUXURIOUS SLED IS HEAVY.

AND THE SNOW IS FALLING ALL THE TIME, COVERING EVERYTHING AROUND.

COME ON, BUDDY, GO TAKE A WALK.

AROUND THAT FROZEN LAKE!

GO TAKE A WALK, BUDDY.

COME ON.

COME ON!!!

AROUND THE LAKE.

name: Pokemon Shiny Gold Sigma
description: Sin descripción

name: Teeth of Glass
description:
It begins with one cut.

You play as Doctor Joshua Hagstrom, as he finds himself trapped in an otherworldly fever dream. Just who is the mysterious patient? How can Dr Hagstrom escape? And will he live to see his family again?

Teeth of Glass is a short point & click horror fever dream, with two different endings.

name: Dynasty Warriors 8: Wang Yuanji 'Rorona' Costume
description: Sin descripción

name: Warframe: Jade Shadows
description: Jade Shadows contains significant spoilers for Warframe! To ensure that all Tenno enjoy the best possible experience, we ask that you allow others to complete the Quest at their own pace, and to please be kind. If you’d like to discuss the Quest after playing (and we certainly expect that you will), please use spoiler tags so everyone can experience it as intended. Thanks, Tenno.

name: Potion Quest
description:
A puzzle game where the player must complete recipes by knocking potions into the recipe area as they drop from above.

You have limited time so must act fast and get the recipes completed.

name: Artificial Heart
description: Sin descripción

name: Smaze
description: An NES style fan demake of the hit sony exclusive sci-fi FPS Haze.

name: Quizzical
description: In Quizzical, you study randomly-generated nonsense text and are then quizzed on it.

name: XON Episode One
description:
XON is a first person puzzle adventure game.
Explore a unique world and reveal its mysteries...

name: A.N.N.
description:
A.N.N. is a challenging, adrenaline-fueled boss rush that features:

Intelligent Enemies: The bosses in A.N.N. are powered by a cutting-edge machine learning algorithm. Each enemy you face has been trained over millions of iterations using reinforcement learning, making them intelligent and ruthless adversaries against even the most skilled players.

Fast-paced Combat: A.N.N. emphasizes aggressive, engaging combat. Fluid controls and snappy movements make every split-second decision determine if you emerge victorious or face defeat. No time wasted on levels or boring minions... get straight to the action with the most vicious bosses you've ever fought.

Player Progression: Defeat bosses, steal their strengths, and become more powerful. Just when you think the game can't get any harder, step into the next boss fight and push your limits.

name: Dynasty Warriors 8: Zhao Yun 'Ibuki' Costume
description: Sin descripción

name: Where Kiwis
description: Search for 100 Kiwis. A carefully hand drawn scene filled with cute characters. The process is short and won't take up too much player time. You can choose your favorite dyeing for the convenience of color blind players. Extremely easy to achieve.

name: Where Foxes
description: Search for 100 foxs. A carefully hand drawn scene filled with cute characters. The process is short and won't take up too much player time. You can choose your favorite dyeing for the convenience of color blind players. Extremely easy to achieve.

name: Where Birds
description: Search for 100 birds. A carefully hand drawn scene filled with cute characters. The process is short and won't take up too much player time. You can choose your favorite dyeing for the convenience of color blind players. Extremely easy to achieve.

name: Where Ghost Cats
description: Search for 100 Ghost Cats. A carefully hand drawn scene filled with cute characters. The process is short and won't take up too much player time. You can choose your favorite dyeing for the convenience of color blind players. Extremely easy to achieve.

name: Super Bafo Championship
description: On the street in your neighborhood, the biggest Bafo competition in history is taking place. Face powerful opponents in turn-based combat and collect all the cards to be known as the Grand Champion of Bafo.

name: Dogfights in SLZ
description: Smear the skies with pieces of alien spaceships in Dogfights in SLZ, an arcade shoot'em up with a challenging and addictive aerial combat game.

name: One Step to Rest
description: Cross an unknown nation to escape a devastated and scarce place, seeking a land full of resources to bring rest and prosperity to its people, who bet their very lives on your journey. Defeat monsters trying to stop you in a hack'n slash, procedurally generated game!

name: Hong Kong 97 Gameboy
description: Homebrew port of the unlicensed SNES game of the same name.

name: Zilado!
description: Join a friend and travel through the state of Maranhão by train preventing it from stopping because of its broken wagons by solving small puzzles on this co-op platformer game

name: Brotes
description: A kiwi and his brother who is a little plant live their adventures and stuff. You meet nice people, very nice people and people who are a little sassy but who are nice all the same. You hit the A to roll which is super funny. You can also tap on happy birthday.

name: Sky Climb
description: Soar through the skies like never before and restore balance to the universe with Sky Climb! This first-person adventure brings classic platforming to VR, featuring an intuitive arm-based locomotion mechanism that allows you to fling yourself from one cube to another in low gravity.

name: Kromaia: Annvrsary X
description: Experience the explosive VR remaster of Kromaia, celebrating its tenth anniversary! Immerse yourself in frantic old-school action, high-octane blasting, and a 360˚ environment. Unleash your firepower anywhere and everywhere in this groundbreaking VR adventure!

name: Elysian
description: Elysian is where reality and virtual combat blur. In this heart-pounding FPS, only the strongest and most strategic players prevail. Choose your path: adrenaline-fueled skirmish battles against skilled opponents, or test your limits in the unforgiving Survival Mode. In skirmish, master cutting-edge weapons and futuristic tech to outmaneuver rivals on dynamic battlefields. Survival Mode: face relentless enemies, each wave more formidable than the last. Push yourself to survive. With stunning visuals and responsive gameplay, Elysian immerses you in a world where the line between game and reality dissolves. Join the fight and prove your worth in this unforgettable FPS experience.

name: SoulSync City
description: A cyberpunk movement shooter based on momentum and speed.

name: Hello Yogurt
description:
A scientist, after the death of a loved one, strives to create the perfect lactobacillus in order to prolong life, and with that you play as the surviving lactobacillus who's trying his best to survive the hazards of the human body by jumping over obstacles, enemies, spikes and bottomless pits!

With the coins you get in your runs, you can upgrade or even evolve your lactobacillus to survive longer and you can get bonus prizes by using pills in capsules!

name: Kosmic Kanga
description: Side scrolling platformer

name: Voxelgram: DLC #1
description: An animal themed DLC pack for Voxelgram with 82 puzzles and 6 dioramas.

name: Beatblock
description: Spin to win, and move your paddle around to hit blocks to the beat.

name: Battle Factory Showdown
description:
Battle Factory Showdown is a Pokémon fan game developed in RPG Maker XP with Pokémon Essentials.
The game is entirely dedicated to the famous Battle Frontier facility "Battle Factory."
Rent a team of 4 Pokémon from over 250 available and engage in an endless series of double battles; will you be able to defeat all the bosses and set a new world record?

name: Auti-Sim
description: This game was developed during Hacking Health Vancouver 2013 hackathon. The player navigates through a playground as an autistic child with auditory hypersensitivity. Proximity to loud children causes sensory overload for the player, impacting cognitive functions. This impact is represented as visual noise and blur, as well as audio distortion. Participants described the experience as visceral, insightful and compelling.

name: F.R.A.G.G.
description: Step into the future of gaming with F.R.A.G.G, the ultimate arena combat experience powered by Unreal Engine 5. Prepare yourself for next-generation graphics, intense multiplayer and singleplayer gameplay, and a universe brimming with excitement and competition.

name: Kaihou Kuukan: Over Field
description: Kaihou Kuukan: Over Field is an upcoming RPG game for iOS, Android, and PC, scheduled for release in 2024. It is currently in Early Access.

name: Portal: The Flash Version MapPack
description: Portal: The Flash Version MapPack is a remake of the namesake Flash fan game for Portal. Some of its chambers were included in Portal: Still Alive.

name: Bear Warrior
description: Be a hero Bear with sword and bow and kill fat sumo and find hidden golden skulls

name: In the Abyss
description: A platformer with gravity-changing portals.

name: Fire Emblem: 7 Siblings
description: The continent has been at an uneasy peace following the fierce Magus war. However, 25 years after the fact, strife bubbles once again. Unanswered questions from the previous conflict abound, with dark forces on the move. One family finds itself at the center of the intrigue. An ailing mother and her seven children must navigate the trials that await them, while clinging to each other as they never have before...

name: Mobile Dungeon
description: From the creators of Shakes & Fidget, join us in a new epic fantasy RPG adventure. Get ready to accept our new quest and embark on the wackiest dungeon crawler!

name: The Tentai Show
description: The Tentai Show is a free downloadable game for the Nintendo DSi, availible via DS Download Play. The game was created during the 2010 Nintendo Game Seminar. In the game the player defends Earth utilizing a black hole and a white hole.

name: Logan Kart 8
description: Satiricial Mario Kart 8 fangame featuring bizarre self-insert and parody characters, a wonky physics engine, and a melancholy soundtrack.

name: Mung Daal: Vietnam
description: Satirical fangame based on the classic 2000s cartoon "Chowder", in which the usually goofy father-figure Mung Daal is thrown into the Vietnam war.

name: Farming Simulator 25
description: Farming Simulator 25 floods the fields with a host of new machines, gameplay features, visual upgrades, and even fresh water to grow rice - adding even more agricultural depth and diversity to the family-friendly series.

name: Vivid Dolls
description: Vivid Dolls is an arcade game where you have to draw shapes while avoiding enemies in order to reveal pictures of girls. It was made for the Aleck 64 arcade cabinet, bult using a Nintendo 64.

name: A Trick and a Treat: Dead Letters (And One Other)
description: A Trick and a Treat is a Halloween visual novel featuring two stories: Dead Letters, a horror story in which a man working at the post office opens a letter and learns of something he shouldn't have; and Vamp Me!, a comedic story in which a woman comes home from a Halloween party to see her roommate in the midst of performing a ritual in their living room.

name: Generation Zero: Heavy Weapons Pack
description:
Become the Hollywood action hero that Östertörn deserves!

Grab your bandana, rip off your sleeves, and unleash mayhem on your mechanical foes with four lethal high-caliber weapons that are sure to get your adrenaline pumping.

name: The Intern of Christmas Present
description: The Intern of Christmas Present is a visual novel where Pressie's last trial before becoming a holiday specter is turning the heart of Girl Dracula, enemy of Christmas. It is a sequel to the story "Vamp Me!" in the developer's previous visual novel, A Trick and a Treat.

name: It's Just A Prank
description: It's Just A Prank is a first-person horror game about kids playing pranks on each other until a PRANK GOES WRONG. Experience suspense, fear and unexpected twists as a simple joke becomes a nightmare.

name: Small Fry
description: Use four small fries abilities to figure out how to get them back safely.

name: Aces of Thunder
description: Experience the thrill of aerial combat like never before with Aces of Thunder, the upcoming VR game made specifically with capabilities of PlayStation VR2 in mind.

name: The Sumerian Game
description: A game of strategy and management. The Sumerian Game is one of the earliest computer games. Developed and programmed between 1963 and 1965, it was designed to teach children math, economy and ancient history. The source code was lost but now you can play it again.

name: Ninja Bots for The Playroom
description: Sin descripción

name: Toy Maker for The Playroom
description: Sin descripción

name: My Alien Buddy for The Playroom
description: Sin descripción

name: Reconnected
description: Since moving out of her parents home 5 years ago, Elle has been living as herself with her best friend Roxanne. She works at her job for a majority of her time and lives a decent life. That is, until she receives a message from someone in her past and her life is shaken up once again.

name: Doodle Hunt: Search Hidden Items
description: Doodle Hunt is a delightful seek-and-find game set in hand-drawn cityscapes. Explore charming maps, locate hidden items, and watch them come to life in color! An enchanting adventure for all ages.

name: Lajoy Teckna
description: What lurks in the dark? Survive a shift at the worn-down Rotwheel family storage facility against a slew of murderous cyborgs and hardware malfunctions. Survive the shift and earn your freedom!

name: Mace the Adventure
description: You take on the role of our heroine, who decides to visit the local arcade center, owned by the eccentric Minos. Unknown to her, this is the start of a strange journey...

name: Hobo Life: Greg's Christmas
description: Someone has stolen all the crack in the city, so you team up with the Brick Guy and try to find a way to bring happiness and crack across the city once more.

name: IL-2: Korea
description: Sin descripción

name: Die-abolical
description: Move the dice to destroy all other dice in every level if your value is higher.

name: Nar Station
description: Strange Games Studios, the team behind Honor and Duty: D-Day is currently working on D-Day Enhanced. But that hasn’t stopped the developer from working on a new project. Called Nar Station, this seemingly sci-fi horror-esque game is coming to PSVR 2.

name: Gundam Versus: Navi - Olga, Atra, Fumitan
description: Sin descripción

name: Dragon Ball Xenoverse: Movie Costume Pack
description:
Extend your experience in the unique universe of Dragon Ball Xenoverse with Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection 'F' Costumes.
-Whis Symbol Gi
-Whis Symbol Battle Suit
-SSGSS Goku Wig

description: G-Sector is a 3D action game based around hoverboard combat--a hybrid of an extreme game and a third-person shooter. Players control the heroine, Cyra, as she hoverboards through futuristic cities and arenas. Gameplay is based on ramps and tricks you use to build velocity and avoid opponents' shots. Using a chase-cam and a customizable mouse/keyboard interface, G-Sector should be familiar to players of 3D shooters.

name: Sun's Edge
description: What would you do if the world was ending? In Sun's Edge, you are a ranger exploring the island of Solasta, trying to find a way to keep the world from falling to darkness! In this Aztec themed adventure game, you will need to fight, climb, and solve your way out of problems. Everyone is counting on you!

name: Killing Floor
description:
The original iteration of Killing Floor, which was released as an Unreal Tournament 2004 total conversion mod in 2005 by Shatterline Productions.

Like the future retail editions of the series, it is a co-op survival horror game against waves of specimen from the Horzine corporation...

Early versions of the mod included a short story mode, which was removed in later versions. Version 2.5 was the final version of the mod before the retail release of Killing Floor, though fans did later release up to Version 2.52.

name: Short Adventure
description: An RPG that uses the ATB battle system seen in early Final Fantasy games, Short Adventure follows a diseased young woman who goes from every day college student to criminal to outcast as she tries to cope with her life changing quickly.

name: VRFS
description:
VRFS, or Virtual Reality Football (Soccer) Simulator is a community-driven soccer (football) simulator with focus on realistic physics and competitive multiplayer.

Here are the main features of VRFS:
- PHYSICS SIMULATION: Players can perform almost any trick, from balancing the ball on the tip of their foot to executing curved power shots and long passes. The ball's trajectory is solely determined by the physics engine.

- COMPETITIVE MULTIPLAYER: The multiplayer architecture allows for instantaneous ball-touch response. For example, players can finish powerful crosses at the same speed as in real soccer.

- COMFORT: Players can move around using thumbsticks and play in either a seated or standing position. No intense hand movements are required.

- NO PAY-TO-WIN in VRFS: Only skills matter. No one can buy 'stronger kicks' or 'faster boots.' Keep practicing, and you'll see improvement.

- FREE FOR ALL: Players have full access to the game without needing to purchase anything. However, if you wish, you can buy cool equipment in the store to support the further development of this project.

Please keep in mind that VRFS is still in development, with upcoming upgrades to the physics and scenery. We'd appreciate your suggestions for any enhancements.

name: Chipi Chapa: Brick Breaker
description: Destroy blocks to to the music of Chipi Chipi Chapa Chapa.

name: Stuck in a Yandere Visual Novel... HELP!!
description: Stuck in a Yandere Visual Novel... HELP!! is a comedic BxB visual novel with two love interests to romance escape from.

description: Experience risk in truly wild conditions - become a rock climber !

name: The Adventures of Catto Boi
description:
Are you sick of the same old thing over and over again? Generic non-stimulating platforming, little to no plot development, and overall boring gameplay?
Well... unfortunately, you're out of luck.
The Adventures of Catto Boi is the first of many adventures featuring an angry cat who has to find lost cat biscuits scattered all over some random, poorly designed levels.
Doesn't sound fun... But how would you know if you haven't played it?

name: Is it Wrong to Want to be Locked up, Toyed with and Tortured by a Hot Guy?
description:
Mamiya Hibiki is a regular guy with not so regular interests. He’s a huge fan of the decade-old drama series Possessive Boyfriends, and his favourite character by far is Kirisaki Shin: a deranged yandere who expresses his love with continuous threats of entrapment, torture, and murder.

Hibiki might enjoy fictional characters threatening to kill him, but he’s far less receptive about real men teasing him about these desires.

That’s what Hibiki thinks, at least – until he runs into his silver-tongued tormentor yet again, and things start to get serious…

name: Blast Circus
description: Have a BLAST with your friends on the most explosive game show in VR!

name: Gods vs Horrors
description: Recruit gods from different mythologies, buff and upgrade them, arrange them in perfect formation, and create thousands of synergetic builds! Gods vs Horrors is a roguelike card autobattler in which you coordinate gods to defend the Earth against cosmic horrors.

name: DeathJack
description: Play Blackjack where the wager is your life. Do you have what it takes to beat the host? Let's find out...

name: Nick Jr. Party Adventure
description: Guide Dora, Blue, Chase, Molly, Santiago, Darington and many more around a variety of interactive challenges as they get ready to celebrate the Friendship Fiesta, and explore the Nick Jr. universe in 72 levels across six different themed worlds. Nick Jr. Party Adventures features solo mode or up to 2 player local co-op.

name: A Burger in Space
description: Take on the role of Big B and pilot a unique spaceship in the shape of a burger through infinite space!

name: Mega Tower Assault
description:
Mega Tower Assault is a tower defence game similar to Desktop Tower Defense or Fieldrunners. As with other games of its kind, the idea is to prevent wave after wave of enemy troops to get to the player's command center. This is done by building stationary turrets that automatically shoot at the enemies that come within their range. At the start of the game the player has a small sum of cash that can be spent on different turrets such as chain guns, missiles and flame throwers. By destroying enemy troops and surviving waves the player gets more money that can be used for building new turrets or upgrade old turrets.

The game consists of four different scenarios (beach, snow, platform and lava) each with three levels. A level consists of 20 or more enemy waves and once completed the next is unlocked. While the first scenario (beach) is straightforward tower defending the later scenarios adds additional level features that lead to further tactical considerations for the player. In the snow scenario enemy soldiers can travel safely underground while the platform levels feature conveyor belts that increase the speed of the troops. The lava levels feature platforms that can be moved around by the player. Some levels have neutral buildings that can taken over by engineers. The player then receivers a special function that can be used at any time, for example a rocket attack that destroys all enemy troops.

name: Cattle Country
description: Howdy partner! Welcome to Cattle Country, the only Cozy Cowboy Adventure Life Sim. Become a determined pioneer traveling west to start a new life. Make a home in the mountains, take on bandits, discover dastardly plots, build a farm, develop your town, and make friends with fellow residents.

name: Cubicle Cat Superstar
description: In this ultra-fast paced Japanese flash pop style reaction shooter you play as a fat, overtime working salarycat, trying to fend of thousands of donut attacks by tapping fire buttons according to direction of assault. Your goal is pure survival. Should any donut ever reach your cubicle: game over.

name: Die Feen
description:
This appears to be an island or a peninsula.
This is because the Nider and Loub tribes do not have the ability to draw maps, the Erlmutel tribe does not have the personality to travel far to draw maps, and the Ferns are not even interested in topography, so there is only one person who knows it well. There was no one there either.

name: Rootin' Tootin'
description: A 2v2 cowboy platformer game where players aim to win by collecting coins and items and shooting opponents.

name: Reproach
description: Reproach is a narrative beat 'em up with time-travel and gay cowboys. Help 50’s detective Stout and his new friends, the hard-core band Potus Flotus, to close time rifts across space-time and save his detective partners scattered across time.

name: Shinsetsu Shiawase Usagi 2
description: The sequel to Shinsetsu Shiawase Usagi features the same characters: the nameless main hero and the two school girls: Yuki and Mary. The gameplay is similar to the previous game, the player being allowed only to make a choice occasionally.

name: Tiny Cats
description: Tiny Cats is a mysterious hidden cat-detective game where you need to find all the hidden and deeply hidden cats in the mansion. Save each cat from the mysterious magic that keeps them trapped inside. And uncover the mystery of your late aunt's house.

name: Alkahest
description: Alkahest is an Action-Adventure RPG set in a murky medieval world. Where satisfying melee combat with highly interactive environments takes center stage. Explore realistic locations, learn alchemy and make a name for your family.

name: Burning Out
description:
Burning Out is our third-semester academic project and the team's first game. Based on humanitarian causes relating to mental health, we propose introducing the public to Burnout Syndrome and its consequences in people's lives.

In it, you'll follow part of the story of Nula, a character with no defined gender who faces the daily demands and inconveniences imposed by greater São Paulo in order to achieve her greatest dream.

name: Sigils of Nightfall
description: Sigils of Nightfall is a roguelike deckbuilder that combines dungeon crawling with elements of the award-winning RPG, Mörk Borg. Embark on a dark journey, improve your character, and survive at all costs — or be consumed by the horrors lurking in the darkness.

name: Ultimate Jello Party
description: Ultimate Jello Party is a multiplayer party game that combines elements of card, board and minigame battles. Challenge up to 3 friends and mess up the game with your strategies! Earn coins, plan your moves, collect and accumulate jellies to become the big winner.

name: Smash Drums: Le Frickin’ Rock Show!
description: Sin descripción

name: Maestro
description: Step into a gorgeous opera house with Maestro, the VR orchestra conducting rhythm game that's the essence of elegance, control, and high-society french sophistication.

name: Laser Dance
description:
From the creator of Cubism comes LASER DANCE, a mixed reality game that turns your living room into a laser obstacle course straight from a spy film!

Players move between two buttons on opposite ends of their living room, traversing a sequence of laser patterns which adapt to the room’s size and layout. Different laser patterns will have them move in different ways, as they dance, dodge, and crawl their way to the finish line.

Easy to learn but hard to master - Laser Dance’s deceptively simple gameplay makes for a perfect party game to get both newcomers and seasoned VR players moving in mixed reality!

name: Coaster Mania
description: Create and ride thrilling rollercoasters in your own space with CoasterMania! Use physics-based tools to design jaw-dropping tracks that adapt to your room, then hop in the front seat for a first-person ride like no other.

Manage your city's defenses and protect your citizens by thwarting enemy attacks with carefully timed retaliatory strikes.

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: Wallace & Gromit
description: Wallace & Gromit have opened a mini golf course at 62 West Wallaby Street! Filled with ingenious contraptions to delight both die-hard fans and curious newcomers, you'll be swept away on a fun-filled journey through iconic moments from the beloved films. Grab a club and get cracking!

name: Lovesick
description: After a grueling tour that has left them drained and flat broke, a struggling post-punk band returns home. The group is already on the brink of collapse when a supernatural event dubbed “the Feedback” plunges them all into a twisted alternate reality.

name: Miracle Pool
description:
# The Premier Pool Simulator

**Real Ball Physics:** We spent 3+ years refining the most realistic billiards physics engine.

**Easy Cue Stick Handling:** Learn fast with our intuitive aim, lock and shoot mechanic.

**Mixed Reality:** Pool is best played in MR. Confidently move through your real room to line up the perfect shot.

**Game Modes:**
- Ranked Online Multiplayer
- Single Player Matches
- Private Matches with Friends
- Mini Games with Leaderboards
- Daily Challenges
- Practice Mode

Progression: Earn XP, rank up and unlock new table designs, balls, cues and more! Also improve your competitive rating with multiplayer matches.

name: Memoreum
description: Sin descripción

name: Hide The Corpse
description:
Hide the Corpse is a VR physics-based game where players must hide a body within four minutes across six distinct environments, including a zero-gravity spaceship and an underwater shipwreck.

With quirky humor and immersive gameplay, players will face chaotic fun as they erase evidence and solve creative puzzles. Now featuring a sandbox mode, unlockable levels, and hilarious character skins, Hide the Corpse delivers fast-paced thrills and endless laughs.

name: Deep Cuts
description: Genre-bending blend of messy physics, storytelling, and highly detailed worlds. A new chapter in the Scythe Saga Universe from the horror masterminds behind Happy's Humble Burger Farm!
