name: Hidden in Clickville
description: Discover the charming inhabitants of Clickville across the four seasons, as you assist them in locating their misplaced items. Search for all the hidden objects across various levels. The grateful townsfolk of Clickville will be sooo happy! Surprise bonus level for you!

name: Ember Souls
description: Ember Souls is a thrilling VR hack-and-slash game blending parkour, climbing and environmental puzzles in a luxurious Persian palace. Harness the power of the Ember Stones to unlock new abilities and use your combat skills and agility to defeat the mysterious Shadow Sultan.

name: Starwave
description: STARWAVE launches you into a cosmic voyage of high-energy music and exhilarating freeform movement. Feel the rhythm of the universe as you soar through distant galaxies bringing color and light to the night sky.

name: Wolfenstein 3D
description:
The SNES version of Wolfenstein 3D has modified episodes and storyline, along with heavy censorship. The changes make this version a different game from the original DOS game, and was used as the basis for the Atari Jaguar, Macintosh, 3DO and Apple IIgs ports.
A Macintosh version would later unite both the SNES storyline and the original DOS storyline in a single release.

The Japanese version has even more censorship than the Western release, with a storyline changed even further.

name: Bounce Arcade
description:
Enter the machine and play pinball like you've never seen before in Bounce Arcade!
Wield your hands as paddles, guiding the ball through a series of immersive pinball worlds, each with their own challenges and surprises.
Nostalgic and frantic elements of classic pinball join all-new skills for a fast-paced arcade experience. Use a tractor beam to attract the ball back to you, and use a controllable lasso to nudge the ball where you want it to go for the ultimate skill shots (if you can master them).
Each world brings its own unique mini-games to the table. In a dusty western town, your paddles transform into pistols for a shooting gallery. In a futuristic space station, use the ball to break up asteroids that enter the docking bay.
Experience chaotic pinball action, flipped inside out!

name: 100 Hiddensaurs
description: 100 Hiddensaurs is a hidden object game with dinosaurs. The game is drawn by hand.

name: By Grit Alone
description:
Stranded. Tormented. Alone.
By Grit Alone is an action horror shooter combining frantic combat, bosses and challenges with a harrowing sci-fi anthology story.

You’re marooned in a bizarre unknown dimension of space, filled with ancient derelicts and ravenous aliens. Uncover the mysteries of the dead as you move ship to ship, slaughtering your way through hordes of brain starved horrors.

Fight. Discover. Survive.
Experience twisted stories from our incredible writers, with credits including Dead Space, Resident Evil and Dr Who. There's no loading screens, no inventory and unlimited ammo; you’ll need skill and focus to rip through the ferocious swarms and get out of this corrupted hellhole in one piece.

By Grit Alone, you will survive.

name: Escaping Wonderland
description:
Escaping Wonderland is a new chapter in the Down the Rabbit Hole saga, and an all new story from the same developers who brought you the original, Cortopia Studios

Puzzle your way through perplexing challenges and lose yourself in an enchanting landscape where up is down, left is right, and nothing is quite as it seems (except when it is, and even then, it might not be).

Prepare for hours of gameplay, brimming with brain-teasers, enchantment, and just the right dash of delightful nonsense. Will Molly navigate her way out, or will she unearth the curious truth that sometimes the best way out is further in? Step into this whimsical whirlwind and discover what Molly is really escaping from and help her recover her memory—if you dare!

name: Ring Academy
description: In 'Ring Academy', you'll embark on a surreal journey as the newest student at a school like no other. Your path to navigating this bizarre institution involves throwing rings to progress through levels, each more whimsical and eerie than the last. Prepare for the strangest classes you've ever attended, taught by eccentric teachers who are anything but normal.

name: The Case of the Mysterious Maulings
description: The good news: you've been invited to a classy dinner party in a stately gothic manor! The bad news: you're a hideous, bloodthirsty monster and you keep viciously murdering people. Avoid suspicion by pretending to search for the killer while framing the other party guests. It's kind of a "Clue" meets "Monkey Island" meets "Doom" meets a dating simulator kind of thing.

description: Creaky Tom's got a devilish plan to raise some quick cash-turn the orphans roaming the streets of London into delicious pies to be sold to unsuspecting citizens. Bag as many Orphans as you can in each level while avoiding the police and other unruly citizens that would keep you from your goal (and steal your precious orphans).

name: Klaroro: Abyss of the Sou
description:
You're just a weak, pathetic young man who's suddenly found himself in a strange world of fantasy and mystery. What's worse, you're soon fighting off... hot mythical maidens?!

Luckily, you've got a phone that shoots hypnotic rays. Master your controls and glide gracefully through this strange world, blasting babes with your wacky weapon.

name: Glogwillette
description: An adventure for the family... use the Arrow keys, E to shoot (only if a baddy is nearby!), and sometimes you will need to use the mouse

name: Pre Post-Modernistic Post-Ironic Dadaism: Dating Simulator
description:
Are you a stunning single bachelor OR bachelorette?!?!

Do you long for true companionship?

Are you attempting to populate a newly discovered planet, but are worried that your offspring won't be genetically suited to survive in a new environment?
